title: Furniture Add-On
description:
Transform your living spaces with the official Furniture Add-On by XP Games. This massive collection adds over 1000 unique furniture variants and blocks to your Minecraft world. From cozy bedroom sets and functional kitchens to outdoor garden decor and specialized laboratory equipment, every piece is designed to blend perfectly with the vanilla aesthetic.

Crafted for creativity, this pack includes fully interactable items like chairs you can sit in, storage units that actually work, and decorative pieces that bring your builds to life. Whether you're a professional interior designer or just looking to spruce up your survival base, this is the ultimate furniture solution.
author: XP Games
